comments.author: piotr.zierhoffer+bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

When trying to close a window with at least one app tab and one normal tab, a notification is shown, that multiple tabs in quantity of 1 will be closed. 


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open an app tab
2. Open a normal tab
3. Try to close the firefox window
Actual Results:  
Notification, that one tab will be closed, with an option to enable/disable warning of MULTIPLE tabs closing. This window normally appears when you try to close many open tabs.

Expected Results:  
No notification at all.
Optionally the notification window could be rewritten to inform about app tabs opened.
comments.creator: piotr.zierhoffer+bugzilla@gmail.com
